narrative.narrative: Grandstar Cargo was around from 2008 until May 2012. Its base was Tianjin,China. It was 51% owned by the large Chinese logistic company Sinotrans,25% by Korean Air,13% by Hana Capital Co, and 11% by Shinhan Capital Co. It used a single 747-400F. It operated service from Tianjin domestic to Shanghai and international to Seoul,South Korea and Frankfurt,Germany.
